attributes.action: Set up a "New Years Dishonour list" to remove bestowed honours and titles from disgraced figures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would allow the Titles and Honours to be removed from Knights, OBE, MBE, etc if it is later found that their contribution was false or that they were dishonest or disgraced.

rejection.details: Please go to The Cabinet Office website http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours for requests relating to nominations.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
